title: Online Tax Consultant – SEO marketing website (frontend)

requirements.summary: Establish a clean, modern corporate visual theme (blue/white with subtle green accents) applied consistently across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: All main pages share a consistent header, footer, typography scale, and spacing system.
Primary and accent colors reflect blue/white with subtle green highlights (buttons, badges, icons, or section accents).
UI is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create global styles (Tailwind base + CSS variables/tokens) to implement the blue/white theme with subtle green accents, consistent typography scale, spacing, and accessible focus states across pages.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions to align primary/accent color tokens with the blue/white/green brand palette and ensure consistent container/typography defaults.
Create a reusable site layout wrapper with consistent header/footer placement and responsive spacing for all pages.
Add generated brand logo asset at this exact path and wire it into the header/footer brand area where applicable.
Add generated hero background asset at this exact path and use it on the Home page hero section for a clean corporate look.
Add generated service icon sprite asset at this exact path and use it on Services overview and service detail pages for consistent iconography.

requirements.summary: Implement site-wide navigation and routing for all required pages including 7 service detail routes and blog post routes.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation provides clear links to Home, Services, Pricing, Blog, Testimonials, and Contact.
Footer includes links to Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
Each page renders with a clear H1 and supporting sections.

file_operations.description: Create the app root with client-side routing and route registration for Home, Services overview, 7 service detail pages, Pricing, Testimonials, Blog, Contact, Privacy Policy, and Terms & Conditions (and blog post pages).
Create a responsive header with top navigation links to Home, Services, Pricing, Blog, Testimonials, and Contact; include prominent CTAs as required.
Create a consistent footer with links to Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions plus secondary navigation/back-to-top and brand info.
Wire Header and Footer into the layout and ensure all routed pages render inside the shared layout.

requirements.summary: Build the Home page with the provided SEO-optimized H1, intro paragraph, and prominent above-the-fold CTA bullets.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page H1 matches the provided text exactly.
Home page includes the provided intro paragraph content in readable, keyword-rich copy.
Home page displays a prominent CTA block above the fold (or near top) containing all three CTA bullets.

file_operations.description: Implement the Home page content including the exact H1 “Online Tax Consultant – Trusted Tax Filing & GST Experts in India”, the provided intro paragraph, and a prominent CTA area with the three bullet CTAs; incorporate the hero background from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png.
Add a single source of truth for the provided Home page SEO copy (H1, intro paragraph, CTA bullets) to avoid drift and enable reuse in meta/structured sections.

requirements.summary: Add persistent, prominent CTAs site-wide linking to Contact and WhatsApp click-to-chat with a prefilled message.
acceptanceCriteria: All three CTAs appear on the Home page and at least one other page (e.g., Services overview).
CTA buttons are visually prominent and consistent with the design theme.
At least one CTA triggers WhatsApp contact (via a wa.me link) with a prefilled message including “Online Tax Consultant”.

file_operations.description: Create reusable CTA button group(s) for “Book Free Consultation”, “File Your ITR Now”, and “Talk to Tax Expert”, styled consistently with the theme and usable in header/hero/sections.
Create a utility to build wa.me click-to-chat URLs with a prefilled message that includes “Online Tax Consultant” and optionally includes the selected service.
Place persistent CTA buttons in the header/hero area using the shared CTA components and wire at least one CTA to open the WhatsApp flow built via the WhatsApp utility.
Add at least one prominent CTA block on the Services overview page using the shared CTA components and linking to Contact/WhatsApp.
Ensure the Home page hero/near-top CTA block uses the shared CTA components and includes at least one WhatsApp-triggering CTA.

requirements.summary: Create a Services overview page and 7 service detail pages using the provided service content and SEO keywords, each with CTAs to Contact/WhatsApp.
acceptanceCriteria: Services overview page lists exactly these services: ITR Filing; GST Registration & Filing; Business Registration Services; Tax Planning & Advisory; TDS Return Filing; Accounting & Bookkeeping; Notice & Compliance Handling.
Each service detail page includes the provided service content text and prominently displays the provided keywords (naturally in headings/paragraphs, not as a spammy list).
Each service detail page includes at least one CTA button leading to Contact/WhatsApp.

file_operations.description: Create a structured static dataset for the 7 services (slug, title, summary, key benefits, provided keyword themes, provided long-form content) to power overview and detail pages.

Implement the Services overview page listing all 7 services with short summaries, key benefits, internal links to each service detail page, and consistent service icon usage via frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png.

Implement a service detail page template that renders the provided service-specific content and keyword-rich headings naturally; include at least one CTA to Contact/WhatsApp using the shared CTA components.
Wire Services overview and 7 service detail routes into the router, using service slugs from the services content dataset.

requirements.summary: Add an About/Why Choose Us section on the Home page using the provided text, keywords, and bullet list, with a CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.
acceptanceCriteria: About content is present and readable, not placeholder text.
Why Choose Us displays all five provided bullet points.
Section includes at least one CTA leading to Contact/WhatsApp.

file_operations.description: Add the provided About Us text, target keywords, and the full “Why Choose Us” bullet list in a reusable content module.
Create an About/Why Choose Us section component rendering the provided text and all five bullet points, including at least one CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.
Place the About/Why Choose Us section on the Home page (as a dedicated section) and ensure it contains the required CTA.

requirements.summary: Create a testimonials section on Home and a dedicated Testimonials page with professionally styled testimonials and a CTA.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a testimonials section with at least 4 testimonials.
Testimonials page lists the same or more testimonials with consistent styling.
Each testimonial includes at least a name (or initials), customer type (e.g., salaried, freelancer, small business), and a short quote.

file_operations.description: Add a static testimonials dataset (>= 4) relevant to Indian individuals and small businesses, including name/initials, customer type, and quote.
Create a reusable testimonials section component (grid/cards) with professional styling and an embedded CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.
Add the TestimonialsSection to the Home page and ensure it displays at least 4 testimonials.
Implement the dedicated Testimonials page listing the same or more testimonials with consistent styling and a CTA.
Wire the Testimonials page route into the router and ensure header navigation links correctly.

requirements.summary: Create an accessible FAQ section with exactly the five provided questions and professional answers, placed on Home (and optionally elsewhere).
acceptanceCriteria: FAQ section includes exactly the five provided questions in the same wording.
Each question has a visible answer (e.g., accordion) written in clear English.
FAQ section is accessible (keyboard navigable, clear focus states).

file_operations.description: Add exactly the five provided FAQ questions (verbatim) along with clear, professional answers tailored to the offered services.
Create an accessible FAQ section using the shadcn-ui Accordion component to support keyboard-navigable expand/collapse behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add the FAQ section to the Home page and ensure the questions match the provided wording exactly.

requirements.summary: Implement a Contact page with a lead form and WhatsApp click-to-chat integration, including UI loading/success/error states.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page displays a form with at least: full name, phone or email, service selection, and message.
WhatsApp button/link opens WhatsApp click-to-chat (wa.me) with a prefilled message that includes the selected service when available.
Form submission provides user feedback (loading, success, error).

file_operations.description: Create the Contact page including a form (full name, phone/email, service interested in, message), a WhatsApp click-to-chat CTA using the WhatsApp utility, and clear loading/success/error UI states for form submission.
Create a hook that uses useActor to call the backend capability submitLead(name, contactInfo, serviceInterested, message) and returns mutation state (loading/success/error) for the Contact form UI.
Create a reusable LeadForm component that validates required fields, calls the submit-lead hook on submit, and exposes submission state to render success/failure feedback.
Wire the LeadForm component into the Contact page and ensure the WhatsApp prefilled message includes the selected service when available.
Wire the Contact page route into the router and ensure all CTAs link to it appropriately.

requirements.summary: Implement SEO basics: provided meta title/description/keywords baseline, per-page H1/H2 structure, and keyword-rich service content.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document includes the provided meta title/description/keywords (site-wide baseline).
Each page renders exactly one primary H1 and uses H2s for major sections.
Service pages contain the provided keyword themes in natural prose.

file_operations.description: Add the provided Meta Title, Meta Description, and Meta Keywords as a site-wide baseline in the HTML head, and ensure the document language/viewport remain correct.
Create a small SEO utility/hook to set per-page document title and update description/keywords meta tags at runtime when navigating between routes (without introducing external analytics).
Ensure Home has exactly one H1 and uses H2s for major sections (Services preview/About/Testimonials/FAQ), and set page-specific title/description via the SEO utility.
Ensure Services overview has exactly one H1 and uses H2s for major sections; set page-specific meta via the SEO utility.
Ensure each service detail page has exactly one H1, appropriate H2s, and includes the provided keyword themes naturally in headings/paragraphs; set page-specific meta via the SEO utility.
Ensure Blog listing page has exactly one H1 with H2s for major sections and sets page-specific meta via the SEO utility.
Ensure each blog post page has exactly one H1, uses H2s for sections, and sets page-specific meta via the SEO utility.

requirements.summary: Create a static Blog listing page with at least 6 starter posts and individual blog post pages with readable formatting and internal links.
acceptanceCriteria: Blog page lists at least 6 posts with title, date (or “Updated”), and excerpt.
Clicking a post opens a dedicated blog post page.
Blog pages include proper headings and internal links back to Services/Contact.

file_operations.description: Add at least 6 starter blog posts (Tax Saving Tips, ITR Updates, GST Rules themes) as static content with slug, title, updated/date label, excerpt, and full post body sections.
Create the Blog page listing posts with title, date/updated, excerpt, and links to individual blog post pages; include internal links back to Services and Contact.
Create an individual blog post page with readable formatting (headings/paragraphs/lists), and include clear internal links to relevant Services and to Contact/WhatsApp.
Wire the Blog listing route and blog post routes (by slug) into the router and ensure header navigation links to Blog.

requirements.summary: Create a professional Pricing page with tiers for ITR filing, GST filing, and Business registration, including disclaimers and CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page displays at least 3 pricing cards/tiers with included items.
Pricing page includes a brief disclaimer about variability by complexity.
Pricing page includes at least one prominent CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.

file_operations.description: Implement the Pricing page with at least 3 pricing tiers/cards covering ITR filing, GST filing, and Business registration, a pricing variability disclaimer, and a prominent CTA to Contact/WhatsApp.
Wire the Pricing page route into the router and ensure header navigation links to Pricing.

requirements.summary: Add Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages with generic professional content and link them from the site footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Privacy Policy page is accessible from the footer and renders readable sectioned text.
Terms & Conditions page is accessible from the footer and renders readable sectioned text.
No references are made to unsupported integrations (e.g., email providers, third-party auth).

file_operations.description: Create a Privacy Policy page with professional, generic content suitable for an Indian online tax consultancy site, organized with headings/sections and no references to unsupported integrations.
Create a Terms & Conditions page with professional, generic content suitable for an Indian online tax consultancy site, organized with headings/sections and no references to unsupported integrations.
Add footer links to Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages and ensure they are consistently visible site-wide.
Wire Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions routes into the router.
